useCase.name: Assign Vehicles to Agenda Entry

preconditions.precondition: The Green Spaces Manager wants to assign vehicles to agenda entries.

useCase.trigger: New vehicles are available for assignment.

mainSequence.step: Green Spaces Manager views available vehicles.
Green Spaces Manager selects a vehicle.
System assigns the vehicle to the agenda entry.
System updates the vehicle assignment in the database.
Success feedback is provided to the Green Spaces Manager.
